ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:26:33 [Issue ID 4000-166765] urn:comicvine:4000-166765 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:06:12. [Issue ID 278652]
ComicInfo.Summary: The government got the drop on Sil, killing the other-worldly mutant and her newborn son before they could propagate their alien race on earth. At least that's what they believed. Now somehow there's another, and he's on a road trip across small-town America in the second deadly step toward propogating his species. Following the events of the chilling MGM science-fiction movie comes the second issue of this all-new story of an alien species who will populate the earth -- if research scientist Alanna Walker and government operative Erland Naylor can't stop it first!
ComicInfo.Title: Species: Human Race
